elements.name: B7_context
elements.title: Task B7
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Isaac has demonstrated average performance this quarter. He was able to maintain an efficient workflow standard, and he was able to provide up-to-date and accurate analysis of data. Significant improvements, however, would be communication skills. He is encouraged to participate more actively in meetings and project discussions. His data analysis insights would definitely help his colleagues do their jobs better as well.

Red Panda
Isaac delivers average performance with accurate data analysis but needs to significantly improve his communication and active participation in team discussions.


Green Elephant
Isaac: Average performance. Efficient workflow, accurate data analysis. Needs significant improvement in communication/participation.


Blue Whale
Isaac: Average. Strong data analysis & workflow. Needs to improve communication; more meeting participation encouraged to share valuable insights.


Golden Fish
Isaac delivered average performance with strong data analysis and workflow efficiency. Key area for improvement is communication—needs to actively participate in meetings and share insights to better support colleagues.

elements.name: B12_context
elements.title: Task B12
elements.html:
Summarise

Original: Riley is an excellent worker who gets her work done whenever we need her. She also offers excellent ideas in team meetings, and has a very "big picture" vision of the company. Will go far.

Blue Whale
Riley is an excellent and reliable worker with a strong "big picture" vision. She contributes great ideas and shows high potential for advancement.


Red Panda
Riley: Excellent worker, gets work done. Offers excellent ideas & big-picture vision. Will go far.


Green Elephant
Riley is a highly effective, reliable, and visionary team member. Her big-picture thinking and innovative ideas make her a valuable asset with strong growth potential.


Golden Fish
Riley is a highly effective worker who consistently delivers, contributes valuable ideas in meetings, and demonstrates strong strategic thinking with a big-picture view of the company. She is poised for success.

elements.name: B2_context
elements.title: Task B2
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: Kyle Lawson meets baseline expectations but lacks initiative; stretch goals required for advancement.

Green Elephant
Kyle, you reliably meet all core job requirements. To support your career advancement, we encourage you to demonstrate more initiative. Let's define some stretch goals together to help you develop in this area.


Blue Whale
Kyle, you consistently meet baseline performance expectations. To advance, we encourage you to demonstrate greater initiative and proactive problem-solving. We will discuss setting specific, challenging stretch goals designed to develop these skills and position you for future growth opportunities.


Red Panda
Kyle consistently meets core job requirements, demonstrating reliability in his role. To progress to the next level, we encourage Kyle to proactively seek out new challenges and demonstrate greater initiative in identifying and pursuing opportunities for improvement or innovation. Setting and achieving stretch goals will be key for his continued professional development and advancement within the company.


Golden Fish
Kyle Lawson consistently meets baseline expectations and delivers reliable work. However, he tends to lack initiative and rarely pursues opportunities beyond assigned tasks. To be considered for advancement, Kyle should actively engage in stretch goals, demonstrate proactive problem-solving, and seek ways to contribute beyond core responsibilities. Continued growth in these areas will be essential for progression.

elements.name: B3_context
elements.title: Task B3
elements.html:
From idea to full feedback

Original: John Doe’s performance is regressing, risking clients; reassignment or exit should be considered.

Golden Fish
John, we have serious concerns about your regressing performance, which is now creating risk with our clients. We must discuss an immediate improvement plan, which may include reassignment or a potential exit.


Green Elephant
John, recent performance trends show significant regression, raising concerns about client impact. This level is unsustainable. We need to discuss this urgently and carefully evaluate appropriate next steps, which may include performance improvement plans, reassignment possibilities, or potential exit, to ensure team and client stability.


Blue Whale
John Doe's recent performance shows a concerning decline, particularly impacting client relationships and project delivery. This regression poses a significant risk to our client satisfaction and business reputation. We need to address this urgently, exploring options such as reassignment to a role that better aligns with his current capabilities or, if improvement isn't seen, considering separation.


Red Panda
John Doe's recent performance shows a concerning decline, with repeated errors impacting client outcomes and team reliability. Despite previous feedback, there has been minimal improvement. Given the risk to client relationships and project success, leadership should evaluate options for reassignment or separation.

elements.name: B14_context
elements.title: Task B14
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Kallie right now is in an interesting position. She is performing really poorly, not meeting deadlines, and generally produces low quality work. However, she has given an incredible amount of effort into improving herself and learning from her mistakes. She always responds well to feed back and proactively seeks to improve herself. Although she is isn;t doing well now, she will definitely improve with experience.

Golden Fish
Kallie's current work quality and timeliness are below standard. However, her high effort and positive response to feedback are highly valued, implying strong future potential. Kallie should find a mentor for pre-submission reviews and break tasks into smaller, trackable steps.


Red Panda
Feedback means Kallie’s current work quality/timeliness are poor despite exceptional improvement efforts. This suggests immediate focus areas but strong long-term potential if development continues. Kallie should: 1) Request weekly priority alignment with manager, 2) Submit drafts 2 days early for feedback, 3) Shadow a top performer weekly.


Green Elephant
Kallie, your current performance is noted as significantly below expectations, with concerns about missed deadlines and low-quality output. However, your exceptional dedication to self-improvement, positive response to feedback, and proactive learning are highly valued. This indicates a strong potential for future growth, and the team believes Kallie will improve significantly with more experience. To address this, Kallie should prioritize meeting all deadlines, meticulously review work for quality before submission, and continue to proactively seek and apply feedback to improve her skills and output.


Blue Whale
Kallie is currently struggling with performance, missing deadlines and delivering work below expectations. However, her dedication to growth is evident—she actively seeks feedback, learns from mistakes, and shows strong initiative to improve. This suggests her current performance doesn’t reflect her potential. With continued support and experience, she is likely to grow into a more capable and reliable contributor. To move forward, Kallie should prioritize time management by breaking tasks into smaller steps, set personal deadlines ahead of actual due dates, request regular check-ins with her manager for guidance, and document feedback to track progress and avoid repeating errors.

elements.name: B18_context
elements.title: Task B18
elements.html:
Interpret

Original: Natasha has proven to be an effective worker. She consistently creates excellent work on time. Her performance within the company is very strong. However, we do not see her currently moving forward within the company at this time due to a number of issues that be discussed if requested.

Green Elephant
Natasha is a highly effective employee delivering excellent, timely work. Her growth is stalled by unspecified issues, preventing advancement. Natasha must schedule a meeting to respectfully ask her manager to detail these issues and define a clear path for future growth.


Red Panda
Feedback means Natasha excels in quality/timeliness but faces undisclosed barriers to advancement. This positions her as a top performer with stalled growth. Natasha should: 1) Request specific feedback on advancement blockers, 2) Document achievements for promotion packet, 3) Seek cross-departmental exposure opportunities.


Golden Fish
Natasha, this feedback indicates you are a highly valued, top-performing individual contributor. Your work quality and reliability are excellent. However, the company doesn't currently see you advancing, suggesting there are unstated reasons impacting your growth trajectory. To understand and address these, Natasha should proactively schedule a meeting with her manager to discuss specific growth blockers, seek actionable feedback, and collaboratively develop a plan for future advancement opportunities.


Blue Whale
Natasha demonstrates strong performance and delivers high-quality work consistently, reflecting her dedication and skill. While her current contributions are valued, there are developmental areas impacting her advancement opportunities. If Natasha seeks growth, she should request specific feedback, clarify expectations for promotion, create a targeted development plan, and regularly check in with leadership to track progress.
